name: Texas Longhorns Sports Intelligence
description: Mobile-first MCP toolchain focused on the University of Texas athletics stack with explicit emphasis on baseball, football, basketball, and track & field.
author: BlazeSportsIntel Data Systems

citation.requirement: Every data response must include CDT-stamped citations (Central Daylight Time, UTC-5) referencing the upstream provider and retrieval route.

tools.name: get_team_seasons
tools.description: Return recent seasons across Texas baseball, football, basketball, and track & field.

tools.name: get_season_schedule
tools.description: Deliver upcoming and completed fixtures for Texas athletics with baseball-first ordering.

tools.name: get_game_box_score
tools.description: Provide a compact mobile-first box score suitable for live tracking across supported sports.

tools.name: get_player_career
tools.description: Summarize a player career arc across the four supported sports with recruiting and pro signals.

tools.name: get_rankings_context
tools.description: Surface recent polls, trendlines, and strength-of-schedule context for UT athletics.

tools.name: search_archive
tools.description: Search BlazeSportsIntel’s research archive with CDT citation strings baked in.

policies.sport_validation: The MCP explicitly excludes soccer; any soccer query must return a descriptive rejection referencing the exclusion clause.
policies.data_scope: Approved data providers: Highlightly College Feed, NCAA Stats API mirror, Longhorn Network public releases.
policies.privacy: No PII or credential material may leave the MCP sandbox.
